srvMgtUtilReqHeader.purpose: Example of submiision of OEM v2 trajectory data...

otherTrajWrapper.trajFormat: ASCII Text format version of CCSDS_OPM_VERS 2.0

oth:otherTrajTextFmt.trajData:
